abstract: Shares in Bumi, a mining company partly owned by the financier Nathaniel Rothschild, plunged on Monday after an investigation was opened into financial irregularities at one of its divisions.
snippet: Shares in Bumi, a mining company partly owned by the financier Nathaniel Rothschild, plunged on Monday after an investigation was opened into financial irregularities at one of its divisions.

headline.main: Bumi Shares Tumble After Inquiry Into Financial Irregularities
